20101201140659.143|20101201140700.571|CCO|FROM THE VERY BEGINNING WHEN

20101201141707.000|20101201141709.500|CCO|RECOMMENDATIONS DO NOT REQUIRE 
20101201141709.500|20101201141712.000|CCO|THAT A CHAPLAIN OR ANYONE ELSE

20101201141720.000|20101201141722.000|CCO|OUR STUDY, OBVIOUSLY, AMONG 
20101201141722.000|20101201141724.000|CCO|CHAPLAINS IS THAT THERE'S A WIDE
20101201141724.000|20101201141726.000|CCO|DIVERGENCE OF VIEWS.
20101201141726.000|20101201141728.000|CCO|THERE'S SHARP DIFFERENCES OF

20101201141748.667|20101201141750.333|CCO|TEACHINGS IN THE PULPIT BUT THAT

20101201141840.000|20101201141842.000|CCO|GROUND COMBAT REPORT THE LEAST

20101201142348.250|20101201142349.500|CCO|ABOUT SHOWERS, SLEEPING 
20101201142349.500|20101201142350.750|CCO|QUARTERS.

20101201142353.667|20101201142355.333|CCO|WILL KICK HIS ASS.

20101201142357.000|20101201142358.667|CCO|WILL THERE BE BATHROOMS, 
20101201142358.667|20101201142400.333|CCO|SHOWERS, JUST FOR GAYS, GAY BAR 
20101201142400.333|20101201142402.000|CCO|RACKS?
20101201142402.000|20101201142404.500|CCO|IS THAT A REALITY?
20101201142404.500|20101201142407.000|CCO|>> KYRA, AS WE TRAVELED AROUND 
20101201142407.000|20101201142409.500|CCO|THE FORCE AND TALKED WITH MANY 
20101201142409.500|20101201142412.000|CCO|THOUSANDS OF SERVICE MEMBERS, 
20101201142412.000|20101201142413.429|CCO|PRIVACY CONCERNS WAS NEAR THE 
20101201142413.429|20101201142414.857|CCO|TOP OF THE ISSUES THAT WE HEARD 
20101201142414.857|20101201142416.286|CCO|ABOUT.
20101201142416.286|20101201142417.714|CCO|HAVING STUDIED THIS AND LOOKED 
20101201142417.714|20101201142419.143|CCO|AT IT, THE RECOMMENDATION IS 
20101201142419.143|20101201142420.571|CCO|THAT THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE 
20101201142420.571|20101201142422.000|CCO|SHOULD NOT ESTABLISH SEPARATE 
20101201142422.000|20101201142424.000|CCO|FACILITIES.
20101201142424.000|20101201142426.000|CCO|WE THINK DOING SO WOULD BE 
20101201142426.000|20101201142428.000|CCO|DIVISIVE AND PROHIBITIVELY 
20101201142428.000|20101201142430.000|CCO|EXPENSIVE.
20101201142430.000|20101201142432.000|CCO|WE DO THINK THERE ARE ALREADY 
20101201142432.000|20101201142434.000|CCO|AUTHORITIES MECHANICS IN PLACE 
20101201142434.000|20101201142436.000|CCO|SO THAT IF A SERVICE MEMBER IS 
20101201142436.000|20101201142438.000|CCO|UNCOMFORTABLE WITH A BAR RACK 
20101201142438.000|20101201142440.000|CCO|SITUATION OR ABOARD SHIP OR ANY
